product_name: TYLT TYLT Y-Charge 2.1 Dual USB Car Charger
long_description: Revolutionizing in-car charging, the TYLT Y-CHARGE 2.1 Dual USB car charger converts your car's power outlet or cig lighter into 2 distinctive and colorful USB outlets for your on-the-go gadgets. The 2.1 amp output on the Y-CHARGE provides the maximum charge speed today's devices will accept, rapidly charging a tablet or 2 smartphones simultaneously. Unlike bullet chargers, the Y-CHARGE is compact, yet solid and is easy to insert and remove. Y-design with dual USB ports routes the USB cables to the left and right sides of the charger, making it ideal for driver and passenger. Small and lightweight silicone casing comes in at less than 1 oz. and provides a unique and durable charging solution. 4.75 - 5.75V voltage output; 2.1Amp current output.
short_description: Revolutionizing in-car charging, the TYLT Y-CHARGE 2.1 Dual USB car charger converts your car's power outlet or cig lighter into 2 distinctive and colorful USB outlets for your on-the-go gadgets.
